letme reinstall .. and will try to run t: check your squid logfiles, cache.log, etc. for other clues too.
i have cleared that all logs. this time i have deleted /var/spool/squid too. reinstalling squid
Cleared the logs?  Why?  There's usually valuable clues in daemon logfiles. You shouldn't be deleting them...
i used to cleard the logs with echo -n '' >/var/log/squid/access.log, is it the right way?
No need to clear the logs.  They will be rotated and eventually fifo-dropped by the logrotate process...
